attributes.action: To not ban any breed off dogs
attributes.additional_details: I think it's wrong that people are going to loose a family member when 9 times out of 10 all breeds are brilliant family dog it's more the idiots owners that need banning from owning dogs them self's for other people safety as well as the animal
attributes.background: Instead of banning certain dog breeds, why not do a pass or certificate for them for the genuine owners off any breeds so prove there beloved dog are safe around people and focus more on the idiots who use big dog as a status and let both owner and dog do training to get the pass or certificate

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar actions:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650

Introduce screening process for dog owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
